jobDescription: Releaf Society is looking to add to their wonderful team of trim and harvest crew specialists.  If you have previous trim and harvesting experience, and possess your marijuana work permit through Oregon.gov, please send us your resume and cover letter.  Releaf Society serves, Southern Oregon, Eugene, Corvallis, Salem, PDX and surrounding areas, Bend and much more.  We look forward to speaking with you.
jobApplication: Please send Resume to Careers@Releafsociety.com if it does not have your cannabis trim and harvest experience on it, please attach a cover letter with details.
